thread.title: Adele’s Breaks Taylor Swift’s 24-Hour VEVO Record with “Hello” Video
thread.title_full: Adele’s Breaks Taylor Swift’s 24-Hour VEVO Record with “Hello” Video - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Adele’s Breaks Taylor Swift’s 24-Hour VEVO Record with “Hello” Video
text: On Friday, Adele released her first single and official music video in a very long time, “Hello” from the upcoming album “25.” Within 24 hours, the video broke the record for most views within that timeframe, taking the crown from Taylor Swift and her star-studded “Bad Blood.” »
